Record.Synonym: Multiple System Tauopathy with Presenile Dementia
Record.Description: The most common clinical form of FRONTOTEMPORAL LOBAR DEGENERATION, this dementia presents with personality and behavioral changes often associated with disinhibition, apathy, and lack of insight.
